titleStmt.title: A Preparative to studie, or, The vertue of sack
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.
Edwards, Henry, 17th cent.
Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Variously ascribed to Thomas Heywood, Henry Edwards, Francis Beaumont, Richard Brathwaite, and John Taylor.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
